title: @ Riot - Is Kennen slated for an update or skin anytime soon?
body:
With {{champion:85}}  being my favourite champion, I was wondering if the yordle ninja is slated for anything new anytime soon? I was just curious noticing that he hasn't gotten a skin since late **2011** and the only other champions fitting this same criteria include {{champion:14}} , {{champion:44}}  and {{champion:83}}  (all of whom either has had a VU recently or awaiting upcoming VU's before receiving new skins).

I apologize if similar topics may or may not exist; however, I was just curious to know the current state of Kennen. Both Shen and Akali appear to have some kit reworks coming up in 2016, so I was just disappointed to see a lack of Kennen updates (aside from his texture update earlier this year) for quite a long while now.

I love the new skins and updates that the yordles have been getting as they've been brimming with personality recently with new models! However, I would like to see Kennen get some of this love too in terms of appearance and animations as well.

Thanks for reading! I'd appreciate a response whenever possible.

replies.body:
Hey SlyTactician,

Kennen isn't in the update bin like champions such as Taric or Poppy, which means he's totally eligible to receive a skin. That said, I'm unfortunately not able to discuss if he has a skin in development or not. :c

That's fine, I'm glad to know he's been acknowledged about and I really do appreciate the response! :)

I understand the circumstances, and thanks so much for replying Katey (especially at a busy time with all the preseason updates). I was just interested to know if he might get a skin soon or not since it's been a while. xD 

Though I am certain that a future skin of his will be epic; however, you guys make it. ^^ Keep up the great work.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Z3ll4R0U,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-13T18:01:43.463+0000)
>
> Hey SlyTactician,
> 
> Kennen isn't in the update bin like champions such as Taric or Poppy, which means he's totally eligible to receive a skin. That said, I'm unfortunately not able to discuss if he has a skin in development or not. :c

Is there any chance for Kennen to have his IP/RP price reduced soon-ish? Unfortunately the Permanent Champion Price Reduction page on Riot's site is rarely updated, so we only know the 6300 IP champions that are going down 1 tier.
